languages.text: "Никак нельзя". {n}Клотус решительно трясет головой{/n} "Иначе вся пользительность улетучится. Первая модель машины анонимной не была, так исповеди были как под копирку — и прилежны все, и благочестивы. А как {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинный дух{/g} стал хранить тайну имени, так отверзся поток откровений".

"There is not." {n}Klotus shakes his head resolutely.{/n} "That would undermine the usefulness of it. The first prototype wasn't anonymous, so those confessions might as well have been carbon copies of each other. Everyone was impeccably diligent and pious and whatnot. But as soon as the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} started keeping the names secret, the parishioners opened up."
languages.original_text: "Никак нельзя". {n}Клотус решительно трясет головой{/n} "Иначе вся пользительность улетучится. Первая модель машины анонимной не была, так исповеди были как под копирку — и прилежны все, и благочестивы. А как {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинный дух{/g} стал хранить тайну имени, так отверзся поток откровений".

traits.locale_text: "There is no way." {n}Klotus shakes his head resolutely.{/n} "Else there goes the usefulness of it. The first model of the machine wasn't anonymous, so those confessions might as well have been carbon copies. Everybody's diligent and pious and whatnot. But as soon as the machine spirit started keeping the names secret, the tell-alls came pouring in."

"There is no way." {n}Klotus shakes his head resolutely.{/n} "Else there goes the usefulness of it. The first model of the machine wasn't anonymous, so those confessions might as well have been carbon copies. Everybody's diligent and pious and whatnot. But as soon as the machine spirit started keeping the names secret, the tell-alls came pouring in."

The first prototype wasn't anonymous, so those confessions might as well have been carbon copies of each other. Everyone was impeccably diligent and pious and whatnot. But as soon as the machine spirit started keeping the names secret, the parishioners opened up."

But as soon as the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} started keeping the names secret, the parishioners opened up."

"There is not." {n}Klotus shakes his head resolutely.{/n} "That would undermine the usefulness of it. The first prototype wasn't anonymous, so those confessions might as well have been carbon copies of each other. Everyone was impeccably diligent and pious and whatnot. But as soon as the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} started keeping the names secret, the parishioners opened up."

languages.text: « J'ai bien peur que non, {n}répond Klotus en secouant la tête.{/n} Autrement, cette machine ne servirait à rien. Avec le premier prototype, qui n'était pas anonyme, toutes les confessions revenaient à peu près au même : tout le monde était diligent, pieux, sans le moindre défaut. Mais dès que l'{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprit de la machine{/g} a décidé de garder les noms secrets, les paroissiens ont tombé le masque. »
languages.original_text: "There is not." {n}Klotus shakes his head resolutely.{/n} "That would undermine the usefulness of it. The first prototype wasn't anonymous, so those confessions might as well have been carbon copies of each other. Everyone was impeccably diligent and pious and whatnot. But as soon as the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} started keeping the names secret, the parishioners opened up."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai bien peur que non, {n}répond Klotus en secouant la tête.{/n} Autrement, cette machine ne servirait à rien. Avec le premier prototype, qui n'était pas anonyme, toutes les confessions revenaient à peu près au même : tout le monde était diligent, pieux, sans le moindre défaut. Mais dès que l'{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprit de la machine{/g} a décidé de garder les noms secrets, les paroissiens ont tombé le masque. »

languages.text: «Me temo que no». {n}Klotus sacude la cabeza vigorosamente.{/n} «Eso socavaría su utilidad. El primer modelo del confesionario no garantizaba el anonimato, y como resultado todas las confesiones eran prácticamente idénticas entre sí: todo el mundo era impecablemente diligente, devoto y beato. Pero en cuanto el {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritu máquina{/g} empezó a guardar los nombres en secreto, los feligreses empezaron a contarlo todo».
languages.original_text: "There is not." {n}Klotus shakes his head resolutely.{/n} "That would undermine the usefulness of it. The first prototype wasn't anonymous, so those confessions might as well have been carbon copies of each other. Everyone was impeccably diligent and pious and whatnot. But as soon as the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} started keeping the names secret, the parishioners opened up."

traits.locale_text: «Me temo que no». {n}Klotus sacude la cabeza vigorosamente.{/n} «Eso socavaría su utilidad. El primer modelo del confesionario no garantizaba el anonimato, y como resultado todas las confesiones eran prácticamente idénticas entre sí: todo el mundo era impecablemente diligente, devoto y beato. Pero en cuanto el {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritu máquina{/g} empezó a guardar los nombres en secreto, los feligreses empezaron a contarlo todo».

languages.text: “没办法。”{n}克罗图斯坚定地摇了摇头。{/n}“否则这台机器恐怕就派不上太大用场了。它最初的型号并不支持匿名告解，因此那些告解词也都是千篇一律的内容——所有人都很勤奋、很虔诚，诸如此类。不过，当{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}将告解人的名字保密之后，人们就开始真正地敞开心扉了。”
languages.original_text: "There is not." {n}Klotus shakes his head resolutely.{/n} "That would undermine the usefulness of it. The first prototype wasn't anonymous, so those confessions might as well have been carbon copies of each other. Everyone was impeccably diligent and pious and whatnot. But as soon as the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} started keeping the names secret, the parishioners opened up."

traits.locale_text: “没办法。”{n}克罗图斯坚定地摇了摇头。{/n}“否则这台机器恐怕就派不上太大用场了。它最初的型号并不支持匿名告解，因此那些告解词也都是千篇一律的内容——所有人都很勤奋、很虔诚，诸如此类。不过，当{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}将告解人的名字保密之后，人们就开始真正地敞开心扉了。”

languages.text: 「それはありません」{n}クロッタスは頭をふるった。{/n}「それではその有用性は失われてしまいます。最初のプロトタイプは匿名ではありませんでしたから、告白もみんな、カーボンコピーのようなものでした。誰もが勤勉で、敬虔で、そして何事にも熱心だったのです。しかし、{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}が名前を秘密にし始めると、すぐに教区民たちは口を開き始めました」
languages.original_text: "There is not." {n}Klotus shakes his head resolutely.{/n} "That would undermine the usefulness of it. The first prototype wasn't anonymous, so those confessions might as well have been carbon copies of each other. Everyone was impeccably diligent and pious and whatnot. But as soon as the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} started keeping the names secret, the parishioners opened up."

traits.locale_text: 「それはありません」{n}クロッタスは頭をふるった。{/n}「それではその有用性は失われてしまいます。最初のプロトタイプは匿名ではありませんでしたから、告白もみんな、カーボンコピーのようなものでした。誰もが勤勉で、敬虔で、そして何事にも熱心だったのです。しかし、{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}が名前を秘密にし始めると、すぐに教区民たちは口を開き始めました」

languages.text: "Den gibt es nicht." {n}Klotus schüttelt energisch den Kopf.{/n} "Das würde den Nutzen untergraben. Der erste Prototyp war nicht anonym, diese Beichten könnten also genauso gut Kopien voneinander gewesen sein. Alle waren unglaublich sittsam und fromm und all das. Aber als der {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeist{/g} anfing, die Namen geheim zu halten, öffneten sich die Mitglieder der Gemeinde."
languages.original_text: "There is not." {n}Klotus shakes his head resolutely.{/n} "That would undermine the usefulness of it. The first prototype wasn't anonymous, so those confessions might as well have been carbon copies of each other. Everyone was impeccably diligent and pious and whatnot. But as soon as the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} started keeping the names secret, the parishioners opened up."

traits.locale_text: "Den gibt es nicht." {n}Klotus schüttelt energisch den Kopf.{/n} "Das würde den Nutzen untergraben. Der erste Prototyp war nicht anonym, diese Beichten könnten also genauso gut Kopien voneinander gewesen sein. Alle waren unglaublich sittsam und fromm und all das. Aber als der {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeist{/g} anfing, die Namen geheim zu halten, öffneten sich die Mitglieder der Gemeinde."

languages.text: "Hayır yok." {n}Klatus kesin bir edayla başını sallıyor.{/n} "Böyle bir şey sistemin işe yararlığını baltalardı. İlk prototip anonim değildi, dolayısıyla o zamanki itiraflar birbirlerinin fotokopisi gibiydi. Herkes kusursuz derecede özenliydi, dinine bağlıydı vesaire. Ancak {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhu{/g} isimleri sır olarak tutmaya başladıktan sonra cemaat üyeleri içlerini dökmeye başladı."
languages.original_text: "There is not." {n}Klotus shakes his head resolutely.{/n} "That would undermine the usefulness of it. The first prototype wasn't anonymous, so those confessions might as well have been carbon copies of each other. Everyone was impeccably diligent and pious and whatnot. But as soon as the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} started keeping the names secret, the parishioners opened up."
